AppUser - Class in com.revature.models
Defines the basic Application user, with facets such as: an id whether or not they are active first name last name username the hash of their password the salt of their password email the Role

AuthenticationException - Exception in com.revature.exceptions
Thrown when a potential entity is not registered with the system, i.e., a user tries to login to a server they have not registered with.
